title: Building on master fails with g++ 13.1.1
body:
Building with g++ 13.1.1 fails due to missing includes in
```
include/SFML/Network/Packet.hpp
include/SFML/System/String.hpp
include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp
```
They all miss `<cstdint>`.
## Your environment

* Fedora 38
* git master
* g++ 13.1.1, `cmake  -DSFML_BUILD_TEST_SUITE=TRUE` + `cmake --build`
* Special compiler flags used: None

## Steps to reproduce
I upgraded from Fedora 37 (which used g++ 12) to 38.

## Build result:
```none
$ cmake --build .
[  0%] Building CXX object src/SFML/System/CMakeFiles/sfml-system.dir/Clock.cpp.o
[  1%] Building CXX object src/SFML/System/CMakeFiles/sfml-system.dir/Err.cpp.o
[  1%] Building CXX object src/SFML/System/CMakeFiles/sfml-system.dir/Sleep.cpp.o
[  1%] Building CXX object src/SFML/System/CMakeFiles/sfml-system.dir/String.cpp.o
In file included from /home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/String.hpp:32,
                 from /home/ted/git/SFML/src/SFML/System/String.cpp:28:
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:71:40: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
   71 |     static In decode(In begin, In end, std::uint32_t& output, std::uint32_t replacement = 0);
      |                                        ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:71:63: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
   71 |     static In decode(In begin, In end, std::uint32_t& output, std::uint32_t replacement = 0);
      |                                                               ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:87:23: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
   87 |     static Out encode(std::uint32_t input, Out output, std::uint8_t replacement = 0);
      |                       ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:87:56: error: ‘std::uint8_t’ has not been declared
   87 |     static Out encode(std::uint32_t input, Out output, std::uint8_t replacement = 0);
      |                                                        ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:277:40: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
  277 |     static In decode(In begin, In end, std::uint32_t& output, std::uint32_t replacement = 0);
      |                                        ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:277:63: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
  277 |     static In decode(In begin, In end, std::uint32_t& output, std::uint32_t replacement = 0);
      |                                                               ^~~
/home/ted/git/SFML/include/SFML/System/Utf.hpp:293:23: error: ‘std::uint32_t’ has not been declared
  293 |     static Out encode(std::uint32_t input, Out output, std::uint16_t replacement = 0);
      |                       ^~~

      |                                        ^~~
```
